name: the other half (itch) (cataria)
description:
Sunny and Sabina are visiting their uncle's spooky castle and must find their way around by themselves after he had to leave unexpectedly. The twin sisters have a tendency to mimic each other's actions and must work together to reach their room. Unfortunately, if they see a ghost, they will be frightened back to the entrance. Use arrow keys to move; help both sisters to the stairs.

TO DO: fix movement controls, add actual levels, replace placeholder graphics + more
